seodesc: Troubleshoot performance issues with Traces.OpenObserve and Zplane collects and analyzes trace data, allowing teams to understand the flow of requests through their systems and identify bottlenecks and latency issues.

items.title: Troubleshoot performance issues with distributed tracing
items.desc:
• High fidelity tracing for complex distributed systems
  • c++, .Net, Erlang, Elixir, Go, Java, Javascript, PHP, Ruby, Python, Rust, Swift and more supported
  • Backend, frontend, and mobile performance monitoring - all in one
  • Track performance using dashboards

items.title: Open standards through Opentelemetry
items.desc:
• Full opentelemetry support
  • No vendor lock in
  • Built with open-source and open standards

tracesData.title: How can tracing insights empower your applications?

items.title: Unified Tracing Interface
items.desc: Quickly pinpoint the root causes of issues by viewing traces alongside logs, infrastructure metrics, database queries, network calls, and frontend telemetry in a single unified interface.

items.title: Code Performance Analysis
items.desc: Enhance code performance by gaining visibility into the resource usage and execution time of each method and line of code.
